::Wheeljack::

         Wheeljack opens his mouth to explain to Zardus what the weapon
does, when it hit him.  He hadn't even introduced himself to the leader
yet!!!!!

            "Oh um, just a sec, I kinda forgot to introduce myself to you,
oh humble leader, Zardus.  My name is Wheeljack, and I came here to join the
Alliance.  The one named Nemesis Enforcer let me in.  I know your names
because I have a gadget in my arm that can give me a list of my comrades
only.  I built it in myself.  Anyway, this weapon, the inflator, is a deadly
thing to have, best used in the hands of someone with expertise
marksmanship.  It is too dangerous to put in the hands of a badly skilled
bot.  It fires energy that inflates anything touched.  You must shoot it
multiple times, and eventually they will burst open.  Or, I added a
secondary function that fires a large amount of the energy, and either
instantly explodes the victim, or puts them at the point where one more shot
will blow them to pieces, or get popped by a pointy object.  I made this
thing also by myself!!!"
